channel.title: life on Pete Markowsky's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in life on Pete Markowsky's Blog

item.title: Sabatical
item.description: For the next few months, I’ll be on a sabbatical from Capsule8. To keep my wits about me and in an attempt to improve my writing, I’m planning on updating this blog more, weekly. Aside from this blog, I’m hoping to effectively use the rest of the time with my family, reading, and writing up some small projects. Over the next few weeks, I’m hoping to cover a few application ideas related to GitHub actions, some talks, and book reviews.

item.title: Switching to Hugo
item.description: After so many weeks of programming in go, I’ve decided to move the blog to hugo and github pages. I tried pelican but it just didn’t stick, lets see if this goes any better.
